Package simu.model.customerTypes

Class TakeAway

java.lang.Object
simu.model.customerTypes.AbstractCustomer
simu.model.customerTypes.TakeAway
@Entity public class TakeAway extends AbstractCustomer
The TakeAway class represents a takeaway order in the simulation. It extends the AbstractCustomer class and tracks statistics related to takeaways, such as the total number of takeaways, the number of takeaways served, and the average throughput time.

      public void report()
      Generates a report for the takeaway order, including its ID, arrival time, exit time, and total processing time. Updates the total and average throughput times.
